Class HexComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • HexComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Hexagon

    public class HexComponent
extends javax.swing.JComponent
    A six sided chamber. This is not guaranteed to be a perfect hexagon, it is just guaranteed to have six sides in the form of a hexagon. To be a perfect hexagon the size of this component must have a height to width ratio of 1 to 0.866
    Author:
    keang, cs1027
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
